item.description:
Alice and Barb will host an informal square table (smaller and more informal) meeting to check in with each other and meet anyone else who shows up. The format will be the same as next week's round table. Meeting will officially start at 7, but Barb and I will be there at 6:15 to grab something to eat first. You are welcome to find join us then.

Next week, if the weather is willing, we'll have the meeting as scheduled. If you come tonight, maybe you can make a promise to get something done by next week, or at least get some input about possible ways to get unstuck.

By the way, we'll be looking for a bigger venue for next week's meeting and if we find a suitable place, we'll increase the attendance limit.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Alice and Barb and a MWPC sign
item.name: Impromptu meeting tonight!!!
